about_the_game: The game is a first person survival horror games, where the player is required to complete tasks/mission in order to beat the game. Players will need to avoid enemy detection, and explore the environment for clues and objectives of the game. Players will also need  to use their running and hiding ability to keep themselves safe while simultaneously ensuring that their trusted flashlight is fully charged with battery to allow them to navigate through the darkness.

content_descriptors.notes: Mild horror theme with minimal blood and gore. Frequent spiritual horror element.

detailed_description: The game is a first person survival horror games, where the player is required to complete tasks/mission in order to beat the game. Players will need to avoid enemy detection, and explore the environment for clues and objectives of the game. Players will also need  to use their running and hiding ability to keep themselves safe while simultaneously ensuring that their trusted flashlight is fully charged with battery to allow them to navigate through the darkness.

  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX
  • Storage: 710 MB available space

short_description: After a series of oddity that has been disrupting your sleep, you awake one night in an unknown environment that resembles a morgue. Warped into an unknown world, you strive hard to appease the unspeakable horror; trying to find your way out without losing your life.
